data.message: Why does facebook keep changing? I liked it the way it was when I first joined, then it started trying too hard to be what it's not! Facebook, I don't like snapchat, or instagram, please go back to being just Facebook!

replies.message: Hi Lexie. We're building tools to help people share the way they'd like to with their friends and loved ones. The way people share is different than it used to be and stories-style formats are now a common way that people communicate. -Jon

I don't mind that it's available. I mind that it's stuck at the top of my iPhone app with no discernible way to hide it. I won't be updating my iPad until you give us the option to hide it from the top of my page.
Facebook AS YOU CAN SEE NO ONE LIKES IT. SO MAKE IT AN OPTION. DONT JUST SAY DELETE THE CAMERA BECAUSE ITS THE STORY AT THE TOP OF PAGE!!! tHATS WHAT I WANT TO DELETE.
Facebook Sharing is now different because you have deemed it different. Are you sure we like to share this way?

Sorry to tell you Tom but your ipad app will be updated without you choosing it. Happen to my phone. I NEVER update to these ridiclious features then I wake up in the morning and magically they are there. 👎
